name: Jet Fire
description:
'Jet Fire' is a parkour+shooting game. Players not only need to avoid terrain obstacles through the ejector, but also kill the enemy through shooting.
[Game operation]
Left mouse button: shooting
Space bar: jet flight
[Game features]
The player can fly by pressing and holding the space bar for a long time. The height of the flight is determined by holding down the space bar. When the space bar is released, the character will land.
There will be various dangerous terrain in the game, which needs to be passed by controlling the flying altitude.
There will be various enemies in the game, and there will be certain rewards for defeating them.
There will be various props in the game, including props to increase life and props to increase shooting power.
